trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of constraints for a <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta di vincoli per un <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ConstraintCollection is accessed through the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: ConstraintCollection avviene tramite il <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Constraints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ConstraintCollection can contain both <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> and <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> objects for the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: ConstraintCollection può contenere entrambi <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>gli <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>oggetti</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> e per <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> object makes sure that data in a specific column is always unique to preserve the data integrity.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>oggetto garantisce che i dati in una colonna specifica sono sempre univoci per mantenere l'integrità dei dati.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> determines what will occur in related tables when data in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is either updated or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>determina quali verranno eseguite nelle relative tabelle quando dati il <xref:System.Data.DataTable>viene aggiornato o eliminato.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a row is deleted, the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> will determine whether the related rows are also deleted (a cascade), or some other course of action.
trans-unit.target: Se viene eliminata una riga, ad esempio il <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>determina se le righe correlate verranno eliminate anche (cascade), o alcuni altri linea di condotta.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you add a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> that creates a relationship between two tables to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, both a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> and a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> are created automatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando si aggiunge un <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>che crea una relazione tra due tabelle a una <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, entrambi un <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>e <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>vengono creati automaticamente.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is applied to the primary key column in the parent <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, and the constraint is added to that table's ConstraintCollection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>viene applicato alla colonna chiave primaria dell'elemento padre <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, e il vincolo viene aggiunto a ConstraintCollection tale tabella.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is applied to the primary key column and the foreign key column, and the constraint is added to the child table's ConstraintCollection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>viene applicato alla colonna chiave primaria e la colonna chiave esterna, e il vincolo viene aggiunto a ConstraintCollection della tabella figlio.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The ConstraintCollection uses standard collection methods such as <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Clear%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ConstraintCollection utilizza i metodi di raccolta standard, ad esempio <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Clear%2A>e <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method can be used to look for the existence of a particular constraint in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>metodo può essere utilizzato per verificare l'esistenza di un vincolo specifico nella raccolta.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is created when a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> with its <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> property set to `true` is added to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>viene creato quando un <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>con il relativo <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A>proprietà impostata su `true` viene aggiunto a un <xref:System.Data.DataTable>oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataColumnCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Unique%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is created when a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> is added to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object's <xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>Viene creato quando <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>viene aggiunto a un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>oggetto <xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection>.</xref:System.Data.DataRelationCollection> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> un</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> un

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> oggetto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: If the collection is successfully changed by adding or removing constraints, the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Se la raccolta viene modificata aggiungendo o rimuovendo i vincoli, la <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Constraint" name="Constraint" href=""></xref> to add.
trans-unit.target: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Constraint" name="Constraint" href=""></xref> to add.

trans-unit.source: The constraint argument is null.
trans-unit.target: Il constraint argomento è null.

trans-unit.source: The constraint already belongs to this collection, or belongs to another collection.
trans-unit.target: Il vincolo già appartiene alla raccolta oppure appartiene a un'altra raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection already has a constraint with the same name.
trans-unit.target: L'insieme dispone già di un vincolo con lo stesso nome.

trans-unit.source: (The comparison is not case-sensitive.)
trans-unit.target: (Il confronto non è tra maiuscole e minuscole).

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"></xref> with the specified name, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>, and value that indicates whether the column is a primary key, and adds it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce un nuovo <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"> </xref> con il nome specificato, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>e il valore che indica se la colonna è una chiave primaria e lo aggiunge alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se il vincolo viene aggiunto correttamente.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> to which the constraint applies.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> a cui si applica il vincolo.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column should be the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se la colonna deve essere la chiave primaria.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the column will be a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, la colonna sarà una colonna chiave primaria.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constraint already belongs to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il vincolo appartiene già a questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: -Or- The constraint belongs to another collection.
trans-unit.target: - Oppure - il vincolo appartiene a un'altra raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection already has a constraint with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: L'insieme dispone già di un vincolo con il nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: (The comparison is not case-sensitive.)
trans-unit.target: (Il confronto non è tra maiuscole e minuscole).

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref> with the specified name, parent column, and child column, and adds the constraint to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce un nuovo <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref> con il nome specificato, padre e figlio e aggiunge il vincolo alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se il vincolo viene aggiunto correttamente.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The primary key, or parent, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave primaria o padre, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The foreign key, or child, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La chiave esterna o figlio, <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"></xref> with the specified name, array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects, and value that indicates whether the column is a primary key, and adds it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce un nuovo <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"> </xref> con il nome specificato, una matrice di <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> oggetti e un valore che indica se la colonna è una chiave primaria e lo aggiunge alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se il vincolo viene aggiunto correttamente.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Data.UniqueConstraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects to which the constraint applies.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> oggetti a cui si applica il vincolo.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the column should be the primary key.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se la colonna deve essere la chiave primaria.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, the column will be a primary key column.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, la colonna sarà una colonna chiave primaria.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_UniqueConstraint" name="UniqueConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The constraint already belongs to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il vincolo appartiene già a questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: -Or- The constraint belongs to another collection.
trans-unit.target: - Oppure - il vincolo appartiene a un'altra raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The collection already has a constraint with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: L'insieme dispone già di un vincolo con il nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: (The comparison is not case-sensitive.)
trans-unit.target: (Il confronto non è tra maiuscole e minuscole).

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>, with the specified arrays of parent columns and child columns, and adds the constraint to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Costruisce un nuovo <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>, con le matrici di colonne padre e figlio colonne specificate e aggiunge il vincolo alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is added successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se il vincolo viene aggiunto correttamente.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects that are the primary key, or parent, columns.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano le colonne chiave primaria o padre.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"></xref> objects that are the foreign key, or child, columns.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Data.DataColumn"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano le colonne chiave esterna o figlio.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A new <xref uid="langword_csharp_ForeignKeyConstraint" name="ForeignKeyConstraint" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the elements of the specified <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> array to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli elementi dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> matrice alla fine della raccolta.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A> has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>è stato chiamato, `AddRange` non aggiunge tutti gli oggetti nella raccolta fino a quando <xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`.
trans-unit.target: Al momento che `EndInit` viene chiamato, la raccolta verrà popolata con gli elementi specificati nella chiamata più recente a `AddRange`.

trans-unit.source: If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added.
trans-unit.target: Se `AddRange` viene chiamato più volte all'interno di un `BeginInit` / `EndInit` mette in sequenza, solo gli elementi specificati nella chiamata più recente a `AddRange` vengono aggiunti.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> oggetti da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Indica se un <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> può essere rimosso.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior whenever a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> is added to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, is to add a <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> to the parent table and a <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> to the child table.
trans-unit.target: Il comportamento predefinito ogni volta che un <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>viene aggiunto a un <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, consiste nell'aggiungere un <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>alla tabella padre e un <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>alla tabella figlio.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> is applied to the primary key column of the parent table, and the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> is applied to the foreign key column of the child table.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>viene applicato alla colonna chiave primaria della tabella padre e <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>viene applicato alla colonna di chiave esterna della tabella figlio.</xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: Because trying to remove the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> before removing the <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> causes an exception to be thrown, you should always use the CanRemove method before calling Remove, to make sure that the <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Perché sta tentando di rimuovere il <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>prima di rimuovere il <xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint>causa un'eccezione viene generata, è sempre necessario utilizzare il metodo CanRemove prima di chiamare Remove, assicurarsi che il <xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>può essere rimosso.</xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint> </xref:System.Data.ForeignKeyConstraint> </xref:System.Data.UniqueConstraint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to be tested for removal from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> da testare per la rimozione dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> can be removed from collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> può essere rimosso dalla raccolta; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of any <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Cancella la raccolta di qualsiasi <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if this action is successful.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se l'azione ha esito positivo.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: Occurs whenever the <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"></xref> is changed because of <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> objects being added or removed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica ogni volta che il <xref href="System.Data.ConstraintCollection"> </xref> viene modificato a causa di <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> oggetti aggiunto o rimosso.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object specified by name exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Indica se il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> l'oggetto specificato in base al nome presente nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether the specified <xref:System.Data.Constraint> exists before trying to remove it from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo Contains per determinare se l'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Data.Constraint>esiste prima di tentare di rimuoverla dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Data.Constraint>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>metodo per determinare se un <xref:System.Data.Constraint>può essere rimosso.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*> of the constraint.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>del vincolo.</xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection contains the specified constraint; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la raccolta contiene il vincolo specificato. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection objects to a one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> instance starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia gli oggetti della raccolta in una matrice unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>istanza a partire dall'indice specificato.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto unidimensionale <xref:System.Array>che costituisce la destinazione dei valori copiati dalla raccolta.</xref:System.Array>

trans-unit.source: The index of the array at which to start inserting.
trans-unit.target: Indice della matrice in corrispondenza del quale iniziare l'inserimento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the specified <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to return an index to be used with either the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> or <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo IndexOf per restituire un indice da utilizzare con il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to search for.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> per la ricerca.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero di <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> se nella raccolta; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> specified by name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'indice del <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> specificato dal nome.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A> method to return an index to be used with either the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> or <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>per restituire un indice da utilizzare con il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>o <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> if it is in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> se nella raccolta; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> from the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> dalla raccolta in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to test for the existence of a specific constraint.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>metodo per verificare l'esistenza di un vincolo specifico.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the constraint to return.
trans-unit.target: Indice del vincolo da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The index value is greater than the number of items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice è maggiore del numero di elementi nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> from the collection with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> dalla raccolta con il nome specificato.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to test for the existence of a specific constraint.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>metodo per verificare l'esistenza di un vincolo specifico.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>del vincolo da restituire.</xref:System.Data.Constraint.ConstraintName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> with the specified name; otherwise a null value if the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> con il nome specificato; in caso contrario, un valore null se il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> non esiste.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Before using the `Remove` method, you can use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the collection contains the target <xref:System.Data.Constraint>, and the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Prima di utilizzare il `Remove` (metodo), è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>metodo per determinare se la raccolta contiene la destinazione <xref:System.Data.Constraint>e <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>metodo per determinare se un <xref:System.Data.Constraint>può essere rimosso.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> </xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged> event occurs if the constraint is successfully removed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se il vincolo è stato rimosso correttamente.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: The constraint argument is .
trans-unit.target: The constraint argument is .

trans-unit.source: The constraint does not belong to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il vincolo non appartiene alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object specified by name from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> oggetto specificato dal nome dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: Before using the `Remove` method, you can use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the collection contains the target <xref:System.Data.Constraint>, and the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.

trans-unit.target: Il nome del <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> object at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove il <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A> method returns the index of a specific <xref:System.Data.Constraint>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>metodo restituisce l'indice di uno specifico <xref:System.Data.Constraint>.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.IndexOf%2A>

trans-unit.source: Before using the `RemoveAt` method, you can use the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A> method to determine whether the collection contains the target <xref:System.Data.Constraint>, and the <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> method to determine whether a <xref:System.Data.Constraint> can be removed.
trans-unit.target: Prima di utilizzare il `RemoveAt` (metodo), è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>metodo per determinare se la raccolta contiene la destinazione <xref:System.Data.Constraint>e <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A>metodo per determinare se un <xref:System.Data.Constraint>può essere rimosso.</xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CanRemove%2A> </xref:System.Data.Constraint> </xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.Contains%2A>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>evento si verifica se il vincolo è stato rimosso correttamente.</xref:System.Data.ConstraintCollection.CollectionChanged>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Data.Constraint"></xref> to remove.

trans-unit.target: La raccolta non dispone di un vincolo in questo indice.
